name: SomethingScary
0:
”Alexa, ask something scary to say a scary quote”
”Alexa, ask something scary to whisper.”
”Alexa, open something scary.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: something scary
des: Want Alexa to whisper something scary or spooky to you? This skill will whisper something sure to scare any listener. Now with more whisper!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
